pages.text: The $(mob)Blizz$() is a monster that spawns in cold and snowy biomes. It floats in the air and attacks players on sight.$(p)Its attacks consists of volleys of 3 projectiles. These projectiles apply $(thing)Slowness$() on hit.

$(mob)Blizzes$() drop $(item)Blizz Rods$() on death. It can be crafted into $(item)Blizz Powder$(), which can then be brewed into $(item)Potions of Absorption$() or crafted into $(item)Cryotheum Dust$().
